subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “{{q|slang}} to share; to show”
: Partly influenced by {{psm|zh|en|share|notext=1}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|of the sun}} to [[shine]] on
# to [[hang out]] to [[dry]] in the [[sun]]
# {{lb|zh|neologism|slang}} to [[display]] [[publicly]] to [[show off]]; to [[share]] (in order to [[fish for compliments]])
